From: "Wilthram Ponth" <Rudra656@...>

::Enertron::
      "You're fast I'll give you that.  Time for something new, I 
think."  He puts his arms down at his sides.  He opens and closes his 
hands once, then raises them to directly in front of his face, his 
thumbs inward.  He flings his arms to the sides and an arcing blade 
apears between them.  The blade quickly splits in two and leaves 
Enertron holding two 3 ft long blades of energy.  He flies straight 
at Galvatron with his newly formed weapons.
